doc.previous: In December 2012 Nyoni Reiling resigned and press reports in May 2013 indicated internal conflicts and that two directors had been suspended for gross mismanagement pending investigations 45
doc.after: Despite various initiatives to privatise the airline in whole or in part Air Botswana remains 100 owned by the Government of Botswana
